00021 #define RDK2_RSENSORS_RBLOBDATA

00024 #include <rdkcore/rgeometry/rpoint2od.h>

00027 namespace RDK2 { namespace RSensorData {
00028 
00029     using namespace RDK2::RGeometry;
00030 
00031     struct RBlobData : public RDK2::Object {
00032     
00033         struct Blob {
00034             unsigned int color;    
00035             unsigned int area;     
00036             unsigned short x;      
00037             unsigned short y;      
00038             unsigned short left;   
00039             unsigned short right;  
00040             unsigned short top;    
00041             unsigned short bottom; 
00042             unsigned short range;  
00043             enum Channel { RED = 0,
00044                          GREEN = 1,
00045                          BLUE = 2,
00046                          YELLOW = 3,
00047                          CYAN = 4,
00048                          MAGENTA = 5 };
00049             Channel channel;    
00050             static const char* getName( Channel channel );
00051         };
00052     
00053         RBlobData();
00054     
00055         RDK2_DEFAULT_CLONE(RBlobData);
00056         
00057         unsigned int stamp; 
00058         timeval timestamp;
00059         double    panAngle; 
00060         double    tiltAngle;    
00061         double    zoomAngle;    
00062         RPoint2od robotPose;    
00063         unsigned short width;   
00064         unsigned short height;  
00065         
00066         typedef std::list< std::list< Blob > > BlobSet;
00067         BlobSet blobSet;
00068     };
